question: who is madelyn walker?

question: what is madelyn walker?
answer: With Bachelor's degree in Communitcations from High Point University, from South Davidson High School, Madelyn (Varner) Walker has 1 yr 11 mos of experience as a Area Vice President at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 3 yrs 2 mos of experience as a Market Manager II at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 3 yrs 9 mos of experience as a Market Manager at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 6 mos of experience as a Assistant Branch Manger at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 7 mos of experience as a Staffing Manager at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 1 yr 2 mos of experience as a Staffing Consultant at Randstad USA in Greensboro--Winston-Salem--High Point Area, 5 yrs 6 mos of experience as a Legal Assistant at Law Office of Snyder & Barnhill in Lexington, North Carolina and is proficient in Customer Service, Microsoft Office, PowerPoint, Social Media, Social Networking, Leadership, Microsoft Excel, Management, Research, Sales, Time Management, Marketing, Outlook, Event Planning, Microsoft Word, Facebook, Public Speaking, Public Relations, Teamwork, Teaching, Promotional, English, Recruiting, Photoshop, Instagram, Windows, Sales Management, Social Media Marketing, Pinterest, HTML, Networking, Pageants, Trade Shows, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Outlook, 2020 Women in Leadership Scholarship Award Recipient.
